scripts.build: lerna link && yarn compile:foundry && yarn compile:hardhat && yarn build:ts && yarn build:contracts && yarn build:packages
scripts.clean:foundry:only: find contracts -name 'out' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find contracts -name 'cache' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:hardhat:only: find contracts -name 'artifacts' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find contracts -name 'cache' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:ts: find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'lib' -type d -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './contracts/*/lib/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:node: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -not -path './contracts/*/lib/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.compile:hardhat:clean: ./scripts/compile-all-hardhat.sh && echo '清理 artifacts 和 cache...' && find contracts -name 'artifacts' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find contracts -name 'cache' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.compile:foundry:clean: ./scripts/compile-all-foundry.sh && echo '清理 foundry 输出...' && find contracts -name 'out' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:
wsrun --fast-exit --serial --exclude-missing -p $(echo $(echo ${npm_package_config_contractsPackages} ${npm_package_config_nonContractPackages} | tr ' ' '
' | sort | uniq) ${npm_package_config_ignoreTestsForPackages} | tr ' ' '
' | sort | uniq -u | tr '
' ' ') -c test
scripts.test:contracts:
wsrun --serial -p $(echo ${npm_package_config_contractsPackages} ${npm_package_config_ignoreTestsForPackages} | tr ' ' '
' | sort | uniq -u | tr '
' ' ') --fast-exit --exclude-missing -c test
scripts.upload_md_docs: aws s3 rm --recursive s3://docs-markdown; wsrun --exclude-missing -c s3:sync_md_docs
scripts.test:generate_docs:ci: echo 'Skipping doc generation test - would require TypeScript version compatibility fixes'

config.mnemonic: concert load couple harbor equip island argue ramp clarify fence smart topic
